1.title: American Alien
1.plot: Supergirl is called into action when remnants of Cadmus attempt to assassinate pro-alien leaders, but their endgame turns out to be more sinister than she thinks.

2.title: Fallout
2.plot: When a shocking revelation brings chaos to National City, Supergirl sets out to capture Mercy Graves.

3.title: Man of Steel
3.plot: The story of how Ben Lockwood became Agent Liberty is told.

4.title: Ahimsa
4.plot: Alex asks Lena and Brainiac to team up and help Supergirl; J'onn discovers new ways to help his fellow aliens after running into Manchester Black.

5.title: Parasite Lost
5.plot: Colonel Haley makes a surprising decision about Supergirl; Kara writes a series of articles about aliens in National City that end up putting them in harm's way.

6.title: Call to Action
6.plot: As everyone gathers for Thanksgiving, Kara is feeling down after her televised debate with Ben Lockwood; James and Lena argue about the best way to handle the Children of Liberty.

7.title: Rather the Fallen Angel
7.plot: James falls in deeper with the Children of Liberty in his efforts to meet Agent Liberty. Meanwhile, Supergirl and Manchester Black follow a lead on Agent Liberty's location, but things take a dark turn. Lena kicks off her first set of trials.

8.title: Bunker Hill
8.plot: Nia has a powerful dream about Agent Liberty but refuses to look at it as a prophetic dream and pushes it aside. After noticing something is bothering Nia, Kara enlists Brainy's help, and the two try to persuade Nia to embrace her destiny. Meanwhile, Manchester Black pays Ben Lockwood a menacing visit.

9.title: Elseworlds, Part 3
9.plot: Supergirl, The Flash, Green Arrow and Superman face the battle of their lives.

10.title: Suspicious Minds
10.plot: Colonel Haley is upset after Supergirl responds to a distress call from a Navy ship that turned out to be a deadly alien attack. Colonel Haley reclaims the site as DEO territory and demands that Supergirl step aside. After Supergirl refuses to be told what to do, Haley refocuses her energy on finding out Supergirl's true identity and begins to interrogate all DEO agents, including Alex. Meanwhile, Brainiac-5 tries to persuade Nia to embrace her superpowers but she misinterprets his motives.

11.title: Blood Memory
11.plot: Kara joins Nia on a trip to Nia's hometown to visit her family during the town's annual Harvest Festival. While home, Nia's mother encourages her daughter to embrace her destiny. Meanwhile, Alex deals with a street drug that is turning people violent and giving them temporary superpowers.

12.title: Menagerie
12.plot: With his P.I. shingle newly hung outside his office, J'onn welcomes new clients. Trying to take her mind off what happened at the DEO, Kara decides to team up with J'onn on his latest assignment, which unfortunately ends up tying directly into Alex's current investigation that involves the villain Menagerie. Meanwhile, Lena shares some news with James, but his reaction isn't what she expected. Nia invites Brainy to her Valentine's Day party.

13.title: What's So Funny About Truth, Justice, and the American Way
13.plot:

14.title: Stand and Deliver
14.plot:

15.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Twenty-four-year-old Kara Zor-El, cousin of Superman, who was taken in by the Danvers family when she was 12 after being sent away from Krypton, must learn to embrace her powers after previously hiding them.

2.title: Stronger Together
2.plot: Kara must put doubts aside as she tries to apprehend an escapee from the Kryptonian prison; Cat pressures James for an interview with Supergirl.

3.title: Fight or Flight
3.plot: Supergirl's powers are put to the test when one of Superman's most formidable enemies, Reactron, shows up in National City to take her down. In the meantime, Cat makes plans to run an expose on Supergirl.

4.title: Livewire
4.plot: Kara's foster mother visits for Thanksgiving, while an accident transforms a volatile CatCo employee into Livewire.

5.title: How Does She Do It?
5.plot: Kara must protect National City from a series of bombings and babysit Cat's son, while James is visited by Lucy Lane.

6.title: Red Faced
6.plot: Stress makes Kara go too far during a training exercise against a military cyborg commissioned by General Sam Lane, while Cat's mother comes to visit and Winn helps Alex investigate her father's death.

7.title: Human for a Day
7.plot: Supergirl, with her recently drained powers taking too long to return, must deal with life without them, while DEO has a powerful escaped alien prisoner in their headquarters.

8.title: Hostile Takeover
8.plot: Supergirl fights against her aunt and learns some heartbreaking news about her mom, while Catco is dealing with a hacker.

9.title: Blood Bonds
9.plot: A standoff ensues between the DEO and Astra's forces also Non kidnaps Hank, while Kara tries to refute Cat's allegations that she's Supergirl.

10.title: Childish Things
10.plot: Kara does her best to support Winn when he hears that his father Winslow Schott Sr. breaks out of prison. His father looks for Winn for a reason to become like him. Cat offers Lucy a job working at CatCo and Alex asks Hank to use his powers to find out and uncover Maxwell Lord's plans.

11.title: Strange Visitor from Another Planet
11.plot: Kara helps Hank face his painful past when a White Martian, who wiped out all of the Green Martians from Mars, kidnaps Senator Miranda Crane who is an anti-alien politician. Adam Foster who is Cat's estranged son arrives in National City.

12.title: Bizarro
12.plot: Kara must deal with a twisted version of Supergirl, while venturing into a possible romance.

13.title: For the Girl Who Has Everything
13.plot: A parasitic alien attaches itself to Kara and traps her in a world where Krypton was never destroyed, leaving Alex, Hank and the DEO to fend off a Kryptonian attack without her.

14.title: Truth, Justice and the American Way
14.plot: Kara battles the Master Jailer while dealing with a second assistant at CatCo and disagreeing with James over the DEO's methods.

15.title: Solitude
15.plot: Kara travels to the Fortress of Solitude hoping to find information on how to defeat Indigo, a being from her past who can travel through the Internet. In the meantime, James and Lucy reach a crossroads in their relationship.

16.title: Falling
16.plot: Red Kryptonite makes Kara malicious and dangerous while Cat appears on The Talk (2010) to discuss Supergirl.

17.title: Manhunter
17.plot: J'onn J'onzz reveals how he met Jeremiah Danvers and assumed the identity of Hank Henshaw.

18.title: Worlds Finest
18.plot: Kara gains a new ally when the Flash arrives from a parallel universe and helps her fight the Silver Banshee and Livewire in exchange for helping him return home.

19.title: Myriad
19.plot: Non and Indigo use mind control to make the citizens of National City their army, so Kara must find a way to save her friends.

20.title: Better Angels
20.plot: Supergirl is forced to do battle with an unexpected enemy as she risks everything - including her life - to stop Non and Indigo from destroying everyone on Earth.

1.title: The Adventures of Supergirl
1.plot: Supergirl and Superman team up to stop a new threat emerging in National City. A Kryptonian pod comes crashing down to Earth.

2.title: The Last Children of Krypton
2.plot: Supergirl is hurt by a kryptonite-powered villain sent by Cadmus to attack National City. Superman blames Hank since the kryptonite was stolen from the DEO. In the meantime, Kara's first day at her new job doesn't go as planned when she meets her new boss.

3.title: Welcome to Earth
3.plot: Supergirl and the DEO are assigned to protect the President when an attack on her causes alien vs. human rights in National City to heat up. Alex investigates the case with Maggie Sawyer while Kara fears Mon-El may be responsible.

4.title: Survivors
4.plot: Supergirl tries to stop an alien fight club run by Roulette, while Hank gets to know M'Gann.

5.title: Crossfire
5.plot: Supergirl faces a ruthless new gang that's been given new alien technology by Cadmus.

6.title: Changing
6.plot: The Guardian arrives to lend a hand when an alien parasite drains Supergirl of her power. Mon-El contemplates his motives when he considers a new career. Alex faces a new reality.

7.title: The Darkest Place
7.plot: Supergirl comes face-to-face with Cyborg Superman when she attempts to save Mon-El from Cadmus.

8.title: Medusa
8.plot: As Eliza comes to National City for Thanksgiving, Kara turns to Lena for help when Cadmus unleashes a virus that instantly kills aliens, then is asked by Barry Allen and Cisco Ramon for help with an alien invasion on their Earth.

9.title: Supergirl Lives
9.plot: While searching for a missing woman, Supergirl and Mon-El end up on another planet where Roulette leads a slave trafficking ring.

10.title: We Can Be Heroes
10.plot: When Livewire apparently breaks out of prison, Supergirl sets out to recapture her.

11.title: The Martian Chronicles
11.plot: A White Martian called Armek comes to National City with the intention of bringing M'gann back to Mars to be punished for her treason.

12.title: Luthors
12.plot: Lena is arrested when Metallo breaks Lillian out of prison and evidence suggests that Lena is responsible.

13.title: Mr. & Mrs. Mxyzptlk
13.plot: A magical imp called Mr. Mxyzptlk arrives on Earth to woo Kara, and wreaks havoc on National City when she doesn't reciprocate his feelings.

14.title: Homecoming
14.plot: When Jeremiah Danvers is rescued from Cadmus, Alex and Kara are thrilled to have him back, but Mon-El is suspicious about his sudden return.

15.title: Exodus
15.plot: Alex and Kara realize they must break the rules to foil Cadmus' latest plot.

16.title: Star-Crossed
16.plot: Supergirl goes on high alert when a new villain comes to National City. Meanwhile, Winn's new girlfriend Lyra gets him in trouble with the law and the Music Meister attacks.

17.title: Distant Sun
17.plot: Aliens attack National City with the intention of collecting a large bounty put out on Supergirl.

18.title: Ace Reporter
18.plot: Lena's ex-boyfriend Jack Spheer comes to National City to reveal his breakthrough in nanotechnology that has the potential to eliminate all diseases.

19.title: Alex
19.plot: When Alex is kidnapped, Supergirl and Maggie must work together to save her.

20.title: City of Lost Children
20.plot: National City is attacked by a Phorian, a normally peaceful race with telekinetic abilities.

21.title: Resist
21.plot: Supergirl struggles to decide whether or not to obey the President's orders regarding Rhea's latest actions. Meanwhile, Cat Grant returns to National City.

22.title: Nevertheless, She Persisted
22.plot: Supergirl challenges Rhea to battle to save National City. Meanwhile, Superman returns and Cat Grant offers Supergirl some sage advice.

1.title: Girl of Steel
1.plot: Kara deals with the loss of Mon-El by focusing her energy on being Supergirl and concentrating on a mysterious new threat. Alex confesses a secret to Maggie. A citizen of National City has a mysterious connection to Kara. Lena makes a bold move.

2.title: Triggers
2.plot: A thief with psychic powers attacks National City and proves to be a formidable opponent for Supergirl.

3.title: Far from the Tree
3.plot: Maggie reaches out to her estranged father when Eliza throws her and Alex a wedding shower, while Supergirl joins J'onn on a personal mission.

4.title: The Faithful
4.plot: Kara investigates a secretive new group whose leader, Thomas Coville, has a mysterious connection to Supergirl. Meanwhile, Samantha feels like she's letting Ruby down.

5.title: Damage
5.plot: Morgan Edge blames Lena for children getting sick from lead poisoning.

6.title: Midvale
6.plot: Kara and Alex head home to Midvale for a little R&R. While there, Kara recalls a painful memory of a childhood friend's death and how that traumatic experience brought the Danvers sisters closer together.

7.title: Wake Up
7.plot: Kara investigates when an alien ship lands deep underwater beneath National City; Hank attempts to bond with his father; Samantha looks to her estranged mother for answers.

8.title: Crisis on Earth-X, Part 1
8.plot: The gang comes together for Barry and Iris's wedding, but the ceremony is crashed by villains from Earth-X.

9.title: Reign
9.plot: Supergirl traces the origins of a mysterious symbol to an ancient prophecy and the mark of the World Killer, Reign.

10.title: Legion of Super-Heroes
10.plot: Supergirl remains in a dreamlike state after sustaining injuries from Reign, so Mon-El recruits Brainiac-5, a member of the Legion of Superheroes, to bring her back.

11.title: Fort Rozz
11.plot: Supergirl and Saturn Girl recruit Livewire and Psi for a mission to recover a prisoner from Fort Rozz who knows how to defeat Reign.

12.title: For Good
12.plot: Morgan Edge accuses Lena of plotting an attempt on his life and Kara steps in to help her.

13.title: Both Sides Now
13.plot: The DEO captures another Worldkiller, who escapes and attacks the city's subway tunnels.

14.title: Schott Through the Heart
14.plot: Following the death of his father, Winn must work with his estranged mother to stop a copycat Toyman.

15.title: In Search of Lost Time
15.plot: Supergirl must work with J'onn to contain the chaos resulting from Myr'nn's psychic disturbances at the DEO; Mon-El teaches Kara fighting techniques he learned in the future for battling Worldkillers.

16.title: Of Two Minds
16.plot: Supergirl and Imra have different ideas on how to stop the third Worldkiller, Pestilence. However, when both Alex and Winn are seriously injured by Pestilence, Supergirl and Imra team up to stop the destruction.

17.title: Trinity
17.plot: Still reeling after learning about Lena's secret, Supergirl asks Guardian for a favor that could alter his relationship with Lena forever. Meanwhile, with all three Worldkillers united, Supergirl and the team brace for an epic battle.

18.title: Shelter from the Storm
18.plot: When Reign starts hunting Ruby, Supergirl and Alex work together to keep her safe. Supergirl and J'onn look to Sam's mother for advice on how to stop Reign and come away with shocking news.

19.title: The Fanatical
19.plot: A disciple of Coville's escapes from what's left of his cult and gives Kara and James a journal that could help save Sam; Guardian is found out.

20.title: Dark Side of the Moon
20.plot: Supergirl is stunned to discover that a part of Krypton survived. Meanwhile, Alex is attacked while out with Ruby, and Lena considers how far will she go to keep Reign contained.

21.title: Not Kansas
21.plot: Kara makes a major life decision. Meanwhile, J'onn finds out that special DEO-caliber guns have hit the streets of National City.

22.title: Make It Reign
22.plot: Supergirl learns the true depth of Selena's nefarious plans for Earth. Supergirl, Mon-El and Alura must devise a plan to stop her before Selena gets to Earth. J'onn prepares to say goodbye to his father.

23.title: Battles Lost and Won
23.plot: Supergirl and her team take on Selena in an epic battle for Earth.

locations: Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA::(studio) (Season 1)
imdb.plot outline: Years ago, Krypton was about to explode and Kal-El was sent to Earth to escape that fate. However, his older cousin, Kara, was also intended to accompany the infant as his protector. Unfortunately, Kara was accidentally diverted into the timeless Phantom Zone for years before finally arriving on Earth decades later and found by her cousin who had grown into Superman. Years later, Kara Danvers is a young professional adrift in a thankless job until a fateful crisis ignites a sense of purpose using Kryptonian powers she had long hidden. Inspired, Kara decides to emulate her cousin's superheroic ways, only to find her foster sister introducing her to the secret Department of Extra-Normal Operations, dedicated to fighting alien menaces including those Kara inadvertently led to Earth. Now with such help, the Maid of Might takes her place as Earth's newest champion with new friends and enemies challenging her world.
imdb.title: Supergirl

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.::Kenneth Chisholm

Years ago, Krypton was about to explode and Kal-El was sent to Earth to escape that fate. However, his older cousin, Kara, was also intended to accompany the infant as his protector. Unfortunately, Kara was accidentally diverted into the timeless Phantom Zone for years before finally arriving on Earth decades later and found by her cousin who had grown into Superman. Years later, Kara Danvers is a young professional adrift in a thankless job until a fateful crisis ignites a sense of purpose using Kryptonian powers she had long hidden. Inspired, Kara decides to emulate her cousin's superheroic ways, only to find her foster sister introducing her to the secret Department of Extra-Normal Operations, dedicated to fighting alien menaces including those Kara inadvertently led to Earth. Now with such help, the Maid of Might takes her place as Earth's newest champion with new friends and enemies challenging her world.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)

National City's new hero, _Supergirl_ (qv), takes on the responsibility of keeping the people safe. Going on adventures filled with action, hope and love. She is determined to make a difference by bringing not only her super powers, but her heart to the table as well.::Monique

Kara Zor-El was sent to Earth from Krypton as a 13-year-old by her parents Zor-El and Alura. Krypton was exploding, and Kara's parents sent Kara in a spacecraft to Earth after her cousin. Kara was meant to protect her infant cousin Kal-El, but her spacecraft was knocked off course and forced into the Phantom Zone, where it stayed for 24 years. By the time the spacecraft crash landed on Earth, Kal-El had grown up and become Superman. The series begins eleven years later when the now 24-year-old Kara is learning to embrace her powers and has adopted the superheroic alias "_Supergirl_ (qv)". In the first season, Kara is forced to reveal her powers, and becomes National City's protector. Kara discovers that hundreds of the criminals her mother imprisoned are hiding on Earth, including her aunt Astra and Astra's husband Non. Kara works with her adoptive sister Alex Danvers to fight these criminals, alongside the Green Martian J'onn J'onzz, her cousin's friend James Olsen, and tech genius Winn Schott, Jr. In the second season, Kara and her allies deal with feuds between Earth's native populace and extraterrestrial community, and investigate the shadowy organization Project Cadmus, masterminded by Lillian Luthor, mother of Lex Luthor. At the same time, Kara befriends Lillian's stepdaughter Lena Luthor, the new CEO of LuthorCorp, and struggles with romantic feelings for recent Earth arrival Mon-El, a princely survivor from Krypton's neighboring planet Daxam whose parents wish to reclaim him. James becomes the masked streetfighting vigilante Guardian; Alex begins dating Maggie Sawyer; and J'onn befriends a younger Martian, M'gann, from the White Martian race that killed his people. In the third season, Kara struggles with the loss of Mon-El after he is forced to leave Earth. When Mon-El returns, he reveals that he has time-traveled to the 31st century and founded the Legion, alongside marrying Imra Ardeen. J'onn discovers his father M'yrnn Jonzz is alive and Alex deals with her heartbreak after breaking up with Maggie. Kara and Alex's new friend, Samantha Arias, is unknowingly another Kryptonian survivor, and begins a transformation from a loving single mother into the worldkilling weapon known as Reign.::ahmetkozan
